data.name: Jolt Mine
data.description: A proximity triggered mine that pops up and stuns anything within its radius.

data.name: Jolt Mine Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Jolt Mine

data.name: Junior (Outfit)
data.description: This is the Junior cosmetic outfit

data.name: Jupiter
data.description: A bolt-action sniper rifle with exceptional damage output and accuracy, but slow handling.
data.flavor_text: Very effective against ARC armor plating

data.name: Jupiter Blueprint
data.description: Fires projectiles at an incredible velocity, capable of damaging multiple targets with one shot.

data.name: Kettle I
data.description: Semi-automatic assault rifle. Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time reload.

data.name: Kettle II
data.description: Semi-automatic assault rifle. Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time reload.

data.name: Kettle III
data.description: Semi-automatic assault rifle. Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time reload.

data.name: Kettle IV
data.description: Semi-automatic assault rifle. Quick and accurate, but has low bullet velocity and takes a long time reload.

data.name: Kinetic Converter
data.description: Moderately increases fire rate.

data.name: Laboratory Reagents
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Lance's Mixtape (5th Edition)
data.description: Lance has personally planted a number of these around the Rust Belt, for some reason.

data.name: Laser Trap: Lure
data.description: A deployable laser trip wire that detonates a Lure Grenade.

data.name: Launcher Ammo
data.description: Anti-ARC payloads used mainly by the Hullcracker

data.name: Leaper Pulse Unit
data.description: Can be thrown to create a violent singularity

data.name: Lemon
data.description: Can be consumed for a small amount of stamina

data.name: Lidar Scanner
data.description: A laser-based scanner used to detect the subtlest changer to the Earth's surface.

data.name: Light Ammo
data.description: Light bullets used mainly with SMGs and light handguns. Such as Kettle, Stitcher, Burletta, Hairpin and Bobcat.

data.name: Light Bulb
data.description: Without light, life underground would be impossible.

guide_links.label: Where to Find Light bulbs Guide

data.name: Light Gun Parts
data.description: Assorted spare parts used for pistols and SMGs.

data.name: Light Gun Parts Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft Light Gun Parts

data.name: Light Impact Grenade
data.description: A grenade that detonates on impact, dealing explosive damage in a small radius.

data.name: Light Shield
data.description: A lightweight shield that offers limited protection without severely impacting mobility.

data.name: Lightweight Stock
data.description: Moderately improves ADS & draw speed.

data.name: Lightweight Stock Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Lightweight Stock

data.name: Li'l Smoke Grenade
data.description: A grenade that pops a thick but small smoke cloud on impact, blocking visibility from ARC and other Raiders.

data.name: Looting Mk. 1
data.description: Basic looting augment. More backpack slots and weight capacity, but low defensive and tactical capability.

data.name: Looting Mk. 2
data.description: Significantly increases looting potential; adds slots for trinkets.
data.flavor_text: Automatically throws off attached Ticks after 1s.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Cautious)
data.description: A looting augment that swaps some carry capacity to increase survivability.
data.flavor_text: Upon Shield break, automatically administers a weak Adrenaline Shot. Has a fixed cooldown.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Safekeeper)
data.description: A looting augment that trades weight and utility for increased looting potential.
data.flavor_text: A Safe Pocket that allows any item to be stored.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Safekeeper) Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft the Looting Mk. 3 (Safekeeper) Augment.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Survivor)
data.description: A heavy-duty pack mule augment. Large weight capacity and large backpack space.
data.flavor_text: While downed and stationary, health regenerates up to 75% of max downed health.

data.name: Looting MK. 3 (Survivor) Blueprint
data.description: A heavy-duty pack mule augment. Large weight capacity and large backpack space.

data.name: Lure Grenade
data.description: A noisy device that sticks to surfaces, distracting nearby ARC machines and drawing their fire.

data.name: Lure Grenade Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft a Lure Grenade

data.name: Lure Grenade Trap
data.description: A laser trip wire that detonates a Lure Grenade.

data.name: Magnet
data.description: Fun thing to put on a fridgerator.

data.name: Magnetic Accelerator
data.description: Used to craft advanced weapons.

data.name: Magnetron
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials

data.name: Mastery Medal (Backpack Charm)
data.description: Maintain Wildcard I trials rank until the season end.

data.name: Matriarch Reactor
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Mechanical Components
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items. Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Medium Ammo
data.description: Medium bullets used mainly with medium-caliber weapons. Such as Rattler, Tempest, Arpeggio, Renegade and Torrente.

data.name: Medium Gun Parts
data.description: Assorted spare parts used for rifles.

data.name: Medium Gun Parts Blueprint
data.description: Lets you craft Medium Gun Parts

data.name: Medium Shield
data.description: A standard shield that blocks a medium portion of incoming damage at a moderate cost to mobility.

data.name: Metal Brackets
data.description: Can be recycled into metal parts.

data.name: Metal Parts
data.description: Used to craft a wide range of items.

data.name: Microscope
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials.

data.name: Mini Centrifuge
data.description: Can be recycled into crafting materials
